text: Elisabeth Knechtl (born 21 June 1971) is an Austrian épée fencer. She earned a bronze medal at the 1991 Junior World Championships and a silver medal at the 1992 European Championships. She won the 1992–93 Fencing World Cup series by a single point over Switzerland's Gianna Bürki. ==References== * Profile at the European Fencing Confederation Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian female fencers Category:Austrian épée fencers Category:Sportspeople from Graz Category:Universiade medalists in fencing Category:Universiade bronze medalists for Austria
title: Elisabeth Knechtl
